name: rubeus

procedures: T1482::[Rubeus] can gather information about domain trusts.
T1558.001::[Rubeus] can forge a ticket-granting ticket.
T1558.003::[Rubeus] can use the `KerberosRequestorSecurityToken.GetRequest` method to request kerberoastable service tickets.
T1558.004::[Rubeus] can reveal the credentials of accounts that have Kerberos pre-authentication disabled through AS-REP roasting.

description: [Rubeus](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1071) is a C# toolset designed for raw Kerberos interaction that has been used since at least 2020, including in ransomware operations.(Citation: GitHub Rubeus March 2023)(Citation: FireEye KEGTAP SINGLEMALT October 2020)(Citation: DFIR Ryuk's Return October 2020)(Citation: DFIR Ryuk 2 Hour Speed Run November 2020)
